answers.answer: Go see a different gynecologist.  There's something going on, whether a hormonal issue or what.

question: hi i wanted to ask u i had always had my period every month this last month i had my period twice both with pain and both lasting 8 days in one i had fever went to the gyno she told me she coulnt find anything all she did was a pap smear,diabetes test told me had fever and thats about it goes away 2 weeks but eventually comes back and i dont know what to do i have been also having headaches plz help -lily
title: asap
